By  Patrick SmithDecember  

Senior tight end Desroy Maxwell is in his final season as a Huskie and is looking to finish the year on a positive note PERIOD

Maxwell has put up career numbers in  catching  passes for  yards and three touchdowns all of which are career highs PERIOD He now has  career catches for  yards and four touchdowns PERIOD

Maxwell had his best career game this season against UNLV PERIOD He caught four passes for  yards and a touchdown PERIOD He also rushed twice for eight yards which was his career high in rushing yards PERIOD

Maxwell has mainly been featured over the years as a blocker in the Huskies offense PERIOD NIUs running game has run for over  yards in three of the last four seasons and Maxwell has missed just two games in his four years at NIU PERIOD

The Huskies have gone  this season including a loss in the MAC Championship to Bowling Green on Friday PERIOD They will play in the Poinsettia Bowl against Boise State at  p.m PERIOD Dec PERIOD  in San Diego PERIOD

Q How would you rate your time here at NIU

A Its been a wild ride with this team PERIOD I had fun PERIOD

Q What has been your greatest memory in four years as a Huskie

A Definitely piling up a ton of victories just winning PERIOD

Q How has head coach Rod Carey impacted you as a player

A He pushed me every day to be my best at everything I do PERIOD

Q How did it feel posting a career high in touchdowns this season

A I mean its the most that I have had in my career PERIOD I wanted more but I just do my job PERIOD
